title: EPOS Platform Open Source
text: The EPOS Platform is an open-source, service-based data integration and visualization system built on a microservices architecture. This website provides general information about EPOS, technical documentation on the platform's architecture, and source code for each microservice. EPOS Platform Open Source is released under the GPLv3 license. You can download the installer to start using the platform right away or selectively download specific components in the Download area.
